com.codename1.ui

Class ButtonGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codename1.ui.ButtonGroup

  • public class ButtonGroup
extends Object

    This class is used to create a multiple-exclusion scope for RadioButton. Creating a set of RadioButton components with the same ButtonGroup object means that only one RadioButton can be selected among those within the specific ButtonGroup.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ButtonGroup()
      Creates a new instance of ButtonsGroup
      ButtonGroup(RadioButton... rb)
      Adds all the radio buttons to the group

      Clears the selection such that none of the buttons in the ButtonGroup are selected.

      Returns the number of buttons in the group.

      Returns the radio button at the given group index
